main event: Observers on two different dates saw a bright white light in the western sky near Dayton, Ohio, believing it to be an astronomical object.
interesting points: The UFO was first thought to be Venus and remained stationary during the initial sighting., On another occasion, the object was reported to be moving., One witness reported seeing Mars instead of the UFO a few days later., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes and was observed by multiple witnesses., There were no photographs or physical evidence associated with the sighting.
